metadata.name: Tears of Trees #1/1000
metadata.description: Chiharu Shiota's latest work is a poignant reflection on the power of nature and the human spirit. The installation features delicate tree branches, symbolizing the resilience and steadfastness of life in the face of tragedy. The branches are intertwined with strands of tears, representing the emotional impact of the recent earthquake in the region. The piece serves as a reminder of the need for support and assistance during difficult times. With this artwork, Shiota hopes to raise awareness and bring comfort to those affected by the earthquake, while also offering a message of hope for a brighter future.
